newest.message:
== Breaking Changes ==
* Blueprints data file will not work anymore with previous versions.
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi * stiez
== New Features ==
* Added EVE notification text parsing support. * Added Certificate browser (at last). * Added Mastery section in Ship browser.
== Enhancements ==
* Added link in Help to the Twitter page. * Added status info for each account in API management info window. Widened window so all info are visible on opening. * Added skill points per hour and training time info for each skill level in the skill queue list.
== Misc ==
* Updated starter skills of Blank Character Creator.
